name: Dungeon Adventures of Greedy (O-A-K)
description:
This was made during 72 hours for Ludum Dare 40.

As you collect coins to give you score it will be easier for enemies to hear you as your pocket is clinking. Defeat the boss and help Greedy escape!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

LMB - Attack

Space - Dash

Credits:

Programmers: Hoyung Ling - https://hoyung.wordpress.com/                                                                                        Alric Chitara - https://uk.linkedin.com/in/alric-chitara-77965b6b

Thank you
